attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to bring our troops home from Iraq and Afghanistan. How many more have to be killed in conflict? We have a chance to spare any other families the heart breaking news about a loved one who has been killed in conflict. Why can we not bring them home ALIVE NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
